root.sql: select table_name as TABLE_NAME, comments as COMMENTS from (select b.name as table_name, (select cast(value as varchar) from ::fn_listextendedproperty(null, 'schema', a.name, 'table', b.name, default, default)) as comments from sys.schemas a join sys.tables b on a.schema_id = b.schema_id where a.name = '{{owner}}') a where 1=1 {{#tableName}} and (table_name = '{{tableName}}' OR comments LIKE '%' + '{{tableName}}' + '%') {{/tableName}} order by table_name

select table_name as TABLE_NAME, column_name as COLUMN_NAME, comments as COMMENTS, data_type as DATA_TYPE, data_length as DATA_LENGTH from (select b.name as table_name, (select cast(value as varchar) from ::fn_listextendedproperty(null, 'schema', a.name, 'table', b.name, default, default)) as table_comments, c.name as column_name, c.column_id, (select cast(value as varchar) from ::fn_listextendedproperty(null, 'schema', a.name, 'table', b.name, 'column', default)) as comments, (select name from sys.systypes where xusertype = c.user_type_id) as data_type, c.max_length as data_length, c.precision, c.scale, c.is_nullable from sys.schemas a join sys.tables b on a.schema_id = b.schema_id join sys.columns c on b.object_id = c.object_id where a.name = '{{owner}}') a where 1=1 {{#tableName}} and (table_name = '{{tableName}}' OR table_comments LIKE '%' + '{{tableName}}' + '%') {{/tableName}} {{#columnName}} and (column_name = '{{columnName}}' OR comments LIKE '%' + '{{columnName}}' + '%') {{/columnName}} order by a.column_id asc

select e.name as INDEX_COLUMN from sys.schemas a join sys.tables b on a.schema_id = b.schema_id join sys.indexes c on b.object_id = c.object_id and c.is_primary_key = 1 join sys.index_columns d on b.object_id = d.object_id and c.index_id = d.index_id join sys.columns e on b.object_id = e.object_id and d.column_id = e.column_id where a.name = '{{owner}}' and b.name = '{{tableName}}' order by e.column_id asc
select name AS NAME from sys.schemas
